knimeNode.name: Model Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes KNIME model port objects to a file.

fullDescription.intro: Writes KNIME model port objects to a file, which can be read with the Model Reader node.
fullDescription.option: The file containing the KNIME port objects.
If unchecked, the node refuses to execute when the output file exists (prevent unintentional overwrite).

ports.inPort: The KNIME model to write out.
